exercise-tasks.description: Find the population of Japan using a scalar subquery
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  (SELECT Population FROM Countries WHERE Name = 'Japan')
AS JapanPopulation
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT (SELECT Population FROM Countries WHERE Name = 'Japan') AS JapanPopulation

exercise-tasks.description: List all people living in countries in Asia using a table subquery
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name, Age
FROM People
WHERE CountryID IN
(SELECT CountryID FROM Countries WHERE Region = 'Asia')
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Age FROM People WHERE CountryID IN (SELECT CountryID FROM Countries WHERE Region = 'Asia')

exercise-tasks.description: Find countries where the population is higher than the average population of all countries
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name, Population
FROM Countries
WHERE Population > (SELECT AVG(Population) FROM Countries)
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries WHERE Population > (SELECT AVG(Population) FROM Countries)

exercise-tasks.description: Retrieve names of people living in the most populous city of each country using a correlated subquery
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  p.Name,
  c.Name AS CityName
FROM People p
JOIN Cities c ON p.CityID = c.CityID
WHERE c.Population = (
  SELECT MAX(Population) FROM Cities
  WHERE CountryID = c.CountryID
)
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT p.Name, c.Name AS CityName FROM People p JOIN Cities c ON p.CityID = c.CityID WHERE c.Population = (SELECT MAX(Population) FROM Cities WHERE CountryID = c.CountryID)

exercise-tasks.description: List countries with fewer people than the country containing 'New York'
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Name,
  Population
FROM Countries
WHERE Population < (
  SELECT Population FROM Countries
  WHERE CountryID = (
    SELECT CountryID FROM Cities
    WHERE Name = 'New York'
  )
)
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries WHERE Population < (SELECT Population FROM Countries WHERE CountryID = (SELECT CountryID FROM Cities WHERE Name = 'New York'))
